thread.title: Britney Spears Speaks Out On Niece Maddie's Progress Following ATV Accident
thread.title_full: Britney Spears Speaks Out On Niece Maddie's Progress Following ATV Accident

author: Perez Hilton
title: Britney Spears Speaks Out On Niece Maddie's Progress Following ATV Accident
text:
Girl, Bye! TJ Maxx & Marshalls Dump Signs Promoting Ivanka Trump's Line! 
Donald Trump is probably weeping right now! 
His daughter Ivanka Trump 's line has been dropped from six retailers so far, and we have a good feeling that number is only going to grow. 
Following Nordstrom 's lead , TJ Maxx and Marshalls have instructed their employees to dispose of all signage promoting her collection! 
While her goods are to remain on the floor, they've been mixed in on the racks that don't feature individual designers. 
The sh d ! 
Spokesperson Doreen Thompson didn't share much of an explanation for their recent decision, but did reveal: 
"We offer a rapidly changing selection of merchandise for our customers, and brands are featured based on a number of factors." 
Very interesting! 
Meanwhile, Nordstrom is still asserting they only dumped Ivanka's line due to poor sales. See the tweets (below)!
